issues.title: Triadic Space redirect instead of implementation
issues.description: triadic-space.html is listed in navigation and Interactive Lab as '3D Triadic Space Navigator' but only contains a redirect to interactive-nice-explorer.html. The advertised '3D Navigator' feature doesn't exist as a distinct tool.
issues.rationale: Misleads users expecting a dedicated 3D visualization tool. Either implement the distinct feature or remove from navigation/lab listings.

issues.title: Missing 'How to Cite' section
issues.description: No guidance provided for how researchers or readers should cite the NiCE Framework or associated publications. Academic work requires clear citation format.
issues.rationale: Essential for academic credibility. Without citation guidance, the work is harder to reference properly in scholarly contexts.
issues.notes: Added How to Cite section with APA format, BibTeX, and copy-to-clipboard functionality

issues.title: Missing licensing/copyright statement
issues.description: No Creative Commons license or copyright statement indicating what rights visitors have to share, adapt, or cite the work.
issues.rationale: Ambiguous rights discourage legitimate sharing and citation while providing no protection against misuse.
issues.notes: Implemented dual license: CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 for publications, All Rights Reserved for code. Added to LICENSE file, README, and site footer.

issues.title: Homepage publications section approaching information overload
issues.description: With 4 core publications + 7 worked examples, the publications section is visually dense. Users may be overwhelmed scanning 11 publication cards.
issues.rationale: Consider collapsible sections or 'Show more' pattern to reduce initial cognitive load while preserving access to full catalog.

issues.title: Heavy page sizes for interactive tools
issues.description: interactive-nice-explorer.html (338KB) and behavioral-sink-simulation.html (135KB) are large single-file pages. No code splitting or lazy loading implemented.
issues.rationale: Impacts load times on slower connections and older devices. Consider lazy loading heavy components or code splitting.

issues.title: Interactive tools lack state persistence
issues.description: Calculator parameters (IQ Calculator, Constraint Explorer, etc.) reset on page refresh. Users cannot bookmark or share specific configurations.
issues.rationale: Educational use cases benefit from saving configurations. URL parameters or localStorage could preserve user explorations.

issues.title: Interactive tools are desktop-biased
issues.description: 3D visualizations, canvas-based simulations, and complex sliders are difficult to use on mobile devices. No mobile-friendly fallbacks provided.
issues.rationale: Mobile users should at minimum see static screenshots with 'best viewed on desktop' messaging rather than broken interactives.

issues.title: No JSON-LD structured data for publications
issues.description: Publications lack schema.org/ScholarlyArticle markup. This limits discoverability in Google Scholar and academic search engines.
issues.rationale: Structured data significantly improves academic discoverability and proper indexing of research publications.

issues.title: No dedicated contact page or form
issues.description: Footer shows email address but there's no contact form or dedicated contact page for inquiries.
issues.rationale: Professional academic sites typically offer structured contact options. A form could also filter spam while maintaining accessibility.

issues.title: CDN dependency risk
issues.description: Site relies on external CDNs for Tailwind CSS, D3.js, Three.js, Chart.js, and Mermaid. CDN failures would break critical functionality.
issues.rationale: Consider self-hosting critical dependencies or implementing fallbacks. A build system would enable bundling and offline capability.

issues.title: DOCX files remain in documents folder
issues.description: Documents folder contains DOCX source files alongside PDFs. While PDFs are served, DOCX files are accessible and could be accidentally linked.
issues.rationale: Clean separation between source files and served assets. Consider moving DOCX to a separate working directory.

issues.title: Inconsistent navigation state indicators
issues.description: Some pages highlight current location in nav bar, others don't. Users can't always tell which section they're viewing.
issues.rationale: Consistent wayfinding helps users understand site structure and their current position within it.

issues.title: No publication peer review status indicators
issues.description: Publications don't indicate whether they are preprints, under review, or published. Academic visitors may wonder about the work's standing.
issues.rationale: Transparency about publication status helps readers appropriately contextualize the research.

issues.title: Mixed icon styles (emoji vs SVG)
issues.description: Site uses emoji icons (üåø, üß†, üèõÔ∏è) in some places and SVG icons in others. While charming, this creates minor visual inconsistency.
issues.rationale: Unified icon system would polish the visual design. Not critical but worth standardizing.

issues.title: Mobile navigation menu not collapsing
issues.description: On mobile devices, the hamburger menu stays expanded after clicking a link
issues.rationale: Affects mobile user experience and navigation flow

issues.title: Cascade simulator lags on older devices
issues.description: The animated cascade on interactive explorer stutters on devices with slower CPUs
issues.rationale: Accessibility - should work smoothly on all devices
